channel.title: Run Server. "Weird Error"
channel.description:
Hey I need help. 4 some reason when i run my server this pops up...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 0096*" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:289) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112) MassiveScape Server is now Online.
And when i try to log on, all it does is log me on. But then it freezes, so its just a black screen and all you can see is your inventory. Any solutions?!?

item.title: Run Server. "Weird Error"
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Perhaps a random asterisk?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server. "Weird Error"
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

Majorpvp:

Yes, because i was changing the item prices.

That is where the error is. Whatever you changed look over it. There should be a mistake, fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server. "Weird Error"

item.description:
@Majorpvp wrote:

Yes, because i was changing the item prices.

item.title: Run Server. "Weird Error"
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

        at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:289)
        at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173)

Did you recently add anything to item.cfg?
